name: Pad Thai
steps:
Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok and scramble eggs, set aside.
Cook shrimp until pink, remove from pan.
Add garlic and soaked noodles to the pan.
Mix fish sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar for sauce.
Add sauce to noodles and toss.
Add eggs, shrimp, and bean sprouts.
Garnish with peanuts and lime wedges.
